tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_schedule (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  rotation_year INT,
  tree_species VARCHAR(255),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE agroforestry_system (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255),
    tree_species VARCHAR(255),
    planting_date DATE,
    land_area FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CropRotation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    rotation_order INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE AgroforestryTrees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tree_name VARCHAR(255),
    scientific_name VARCHAR(255),
    average_height FLOAT,
    soil_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE RotationHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_rotation_id INT,
    tree_id INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SoilNutrients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nutrient_name VARCHAR(255),
    nutrient_level FLOAT,
    soil_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherConditions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    rainfall FLOAT
)
